Overview For gstTriPolyMesh Members Chapter

copyPolygons

void copyPolygons( TriPolyMap& newPolys , const TriPolyMap& polysToCopy ) ;

Calls copyPolygon on all gstTriPolys of polysToCopy.

copyVertices

void copyVertices( VertexMap& newVerts , const VertexMap& vertsToCopy ) ;

Calls copyVertex on all gstVertices of vertsToCopy.

getUniquePolyKey

gstPolyKey getUniquePolyKey( ) ;

Returns a gstPolyKey that is not currently used by any polygons held by this object.

getUniqueVertexKey

gstVertexKey getUniqueVertexKey( ) ;

Returns a gstPolyKey that is not currently used by any polygons held by this object.
